name: Dark Zone Defense
description:
Dark Zone Defense is an exciting mix of classic arcade shooter and roguelite.
The game is small but very challenging !!!
Every thing in game is unique, so every time you restart, you'll have new feelings and situation.

Game features:
- No movement, surrounded by the darkness
- 20+ guns, 50+ skills and abilities that can generate hundreds of play styles
- Tons of monsters
- Powerful Bosses
- Steam Leaderboard
- 5-20 minute game sessions

The dark and challenging world is waiting for you!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
This is my first indie game that I solo made, I hope you will like it.
It's may be a nice Halloween gift~
Thank you for any advice and comments.
